name: Star-Dogged Moon
description:
This is a very brief prototype of a horror interactive fiction game based on A Night In The Lonesome October built for a game jam. I was hoping to have more of it finished before the deadline, but ended up hitting some technical issues as it's my first time working with Unity in any depth. I'm hoping to continue to develop this, into an actual game, including more of the amazing assets Vak put together.

Built with Unity and Ink.

Writing + Gameplay: Ree Rolph

Art: Vak

Music: https://patriciataxxon.bandcamp.com/
